pr_title: Fix intermittent failure of AHC-WS itest

timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't this be volatile? HttpResource.java is going to read it from a different thread and it would be better it if gets a non-cached value, wouldn't it?
timeline.author: ppalaga

replies.bodyText: Yeah, you're right. Latest commit fixes that.
replies.author: jamesnetherton
